title: Marc Dupas 2016 Les Parcelles Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: This negociant has produced a simple fruity Muscadet with a zesty texture and easy acidity. Crisp and packed with citrus fruit, it is ready to drink.

title: Les Alliés 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Vin de France)
description: This ripe, fruity wine delivers tropical fruit, apricot and white plum flavors. Its warm acidity leaves a rounded, creamy aftertaste.

title: Ollivier Frères 2016 Perle de Mer Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: The wine is all about crisp juicy fruit. It has only the lightest texture—just apple and citrus acidity. Drink now.

title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2016 Terra de Lobos Branco White (Tejo)
description: This young, fruity wine is crisp with acidity and light in texture. The wine is bright and lively, ready to drink for its fruitiness.

title: Vinadeis 2016 Le Val Cabernet Sauvignon (Vin de France)
description: This stalky wine has black currant fruit and touches of spice and toast. Acidity and tannins are present, offering texture and a crisp finish that make it approachable for drinking now.

title: Bougrier 2016 Alain de la Treille Le Rosé (Vin de France)
description: Based on Loire Valley grapes, this wine is crisp and cleanly fruity. It has pleasant red berry fruit and a cool draft of acidity. Drink now.

title: Bread & Butter 2015 Pinot Noir (California)
description: Spicy new-oak flavors dominate the modest fruit notes in this over-worked wine, knocking it off balance.

title: Castle Rock 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description: Tart cherry and cranberry meet with woody cedar aromas, campfire and nettle on the nose of this widely available bottling. Cherry and strawberry flavors get hit with bittersweet chocolate and pine-cedar touches on the sip.

title: Abiqua Wind 2014 Collier's Early Muscat (Willamette Valley)
description: This wine seems disjointed from the initial aromas through the finish. Its perfume, lemon polish and other mismatched components don't indicate any improvement ahead.

title: Florent Descombe NV Cabernet Sauvignon (Vin de France)
description: Simple and fruity yet lacking in acidity, this is a soft style of Cabernet Sauvignon. It's fruity, with strawberry jelly flavor, and should be drunk immediately.

title: Our Wine 2015 Vineyard Tsarapi Rkatsiteli (Kakheti)
description: This apricot-colored wine offers a bouquet of peach and mandarin orange. It has a chalky mouthfeel from aging in clay amphora. Stewed apricot, toffee and bacon flavors lead to a dry, slightly savory finish.

title: Patriarche Père et Fils 2016 Chardonnay (Vin de France)
description: This is a soft, rounded wine with floral aromas and a line of citrusy acidity. Its light tang gives it a crisp aftertaste.

title: Patriarche Père et Fils 2016 Syrah Rosé (Vin de France)
description: This perfumed, spicy wine has crisp red fruit and acidity. Light and with a soft aftertaste, it's attractive and ready to drink.

title: Ruca Malen 2016 Chardonnay (Mendoza)
description: Dry, peppery field notes and the scent of lanolin set up a plump palate with briny nectarine and salty mango flavors. A round finish holds onto this salty, tropical character.

title: Quinta da Lapa 2016 Nana Rosé (Tejo)
description: A simple, fruity and caramel-flavored blend of Touriga Nacional and Aragonez, this is soft and smooth. Just enough acidity keeps it clean and crisp.

title: The Williamsburg Winery 2015 Limited Release Tannat (Virginia)
description: Aromas of cranberry laced with cocoa, vanilla and cedar are present on the nose. Dense flavors of resinous charred oak, dark chocolate, cranberry, blackberry and dill are full and extracted. Astringent tannins give a closed feel.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Monte de Baía Rosé (Península de Setúbal)
description: An intensely orange-pink-colored wine, this is a blend of the local Castelão with Touriga Nacional and Syrah. Its acidity is filled out with ripe red-berry fruits and a smooth texture of vanilla. The wine is soft and ready to drink.

title: Fuego Blanco 2016 Gewürztraminer (Pedernal Valley)
description: A scent of fresh-squeezed orange juice is likable, while this feels grabby and rubbery but hollow. The finish is all flavors of apple and pickled green fruits.

title: Daguet 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Atlantique)
description: This wine includes grapes from a wide region that extends beyond Bordeaux. It's a classic, light, herbal expression of Sauvignon Blanc with citrus flavors and a tangy texture. Drink now.

title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 Escolha Rosé (Vinho Verde)
description: This sweet rosé is light and crisply fruity. Strawberry flavors make it an immediately refreshing and enjoyable apéritif wine.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2014 Alta Corte Red (Lisboa)
description: With some tannins and structure, this is still a juicy, red-berry-flavored wine. Acidity and the lightly dry core give shape to the bright, ripe fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Patriarche Père et Fils 2016 Viognier (Vin de France)
description: This is a soft, gentle wine, with hints of peaches and apricots and a tangy aftertaste.

title: Florent Descombe NV Chardonnay (Vin de France)
description: This is a soft wine with juicy acidity, a creamy texture and a touch of crisp citrus at the end.

title: Casa Cadaval 2016 Vinha Padre Pedro Rosé (Tejo)
description: This ripe, strawberry-flavored blend of Touriga Nacional, Aragonez and Merlot is soft and smooth. It is rounded with an almost-sweet fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Dona Helena Red (Península de Setúbal)
description: This is a stalky wine with dry tannins under the wild blackberry fruits. It has a green edge to it that spoils its fruitiness.

title: Yellow Tail 2016 Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
description: Fleshy, opulent and exotic, this offers tropical notes reminiscent of apricot and mango that finish rich and warm, with odd spice notes.

title: Aniello 2016 006 Riverside Estate Chardonnay (Río Negro Valley)
description: With little fruit to the nose, this cool-climate Chardonnay smells strained. A chunky palate has a canned-fruit character, tasting faintly of peach and mandarin orange. It lacks freshness, fruit and varietal correctness.

title: Banrock Station 2015 Chardonnay (South Eastern Australia)
description: Wax bean and citrus notes meet dry, woody elements on the nose, but this wine does feature a plump, appealing texture and a soft, easy finish. Drink now.

title: Vita Vinea 2015 Amber Dry Dakishvili Family Vineyards Kisi (Kakheti)
description: True to its name, this wine is golden amber in color. Its apricot and almond blossom aromas lead to quince, underripe apple and bitter almond flavors. Grippy tannins come on strong from first sip and persist into the chalky finish.

title: Eric Louis 2016 Alphonse Dolly Les Doigts d'Or de Dolly Chardonnay (Vin de France)
description: Soft, rounded and fruity, with apple flavors, this is pretty anonymous in character. Drink now.
designation: Alphonse Dolly Les Doigts d'Or de Dolly
